name: Gong (carriongoat64)
description:
Goat pong.

Made for the "STOP WAITING FOR GODOT" gamejam hosted by terry cavanagh. the art is a little not fitting because it was actually made for what i planned to make at first, which was a plants vs zombies. i realized the night the jam began, holy shit, thats waaay too much for me. my partner said to slow my roll, and she suggested pong and that's what i did. i repurposed the assets my friend drew for "Goats vs Pilots". the miner goat icon was supposed to be the sunflower equivalent, the pistol goat was supposed to be like a pea shooter, and the ram was supposed to be a wall-nut. the stage background still has the tiles because i didnt export a png without the tiles and i thought it was a funny reminder of what i thought i'd be making. i think im gonna go forward with this and make it into a pong fighting game, like windjammers or rivals of aether tetherball. wanna add different characters and abilities, + stuff games need for the basics.

  • Controls-
    P1-
    • Up - W
    • Down - S

    P2-

    • Up - I
    • Down - K
    Quit to menu by pressing ESC

Programming by me, @goatcarriona

Art by my homie Alexander, @zayrixx_

Graphic Design by my partner Jane, @jootloops

Playtesting by my sibling Bird, @birdbasterd

Gong 1.1 - fixed wrong sprite for local p2, added escape key ingame to return to main menu
